item.title: No Vacancy: Part One
item.description: The following is a story snippet based on a prompt from this MasterClass article. Father Thomas hobbled down the stone path back from the graveyard. The young priest in his thirties leaned into his aluminum walking cane. He pressed down with both hands, desperately trying to open the distance between him and his pursuer. Thomas craned his neck over his shoulder for a moment. The moonlight outlined Francineâ€™s ghastly figure fifteen feet away.
